original_text: It is God who has worked in us to make us what we are. He has given us a new life because we are united with Christ Jesus. He saved us so that now we can do good things in our lives. Those are good things that he has already prepared for us to do.
korean_text: 우리는 그가 만드신 바라 그리스도 예수 안에서 선한 일을 위하여 지으심을 받은 자니 이 일은 하나님이 전에 예비하사 우리로 그 가운데서 행하게 하려 하심이니라

sentences.original_text: It is God who has worked in us
to make us what we are
He has given us a new life
because we are united with Christ Jesus
so that now we can do good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이제 우리는 선한 일을 할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that he has already prepared for us to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그분이 이미 우리가 하도록 준비해두신 것들입니다
